testCase.name: Login - Should contain a person icon at the top
Login - Should contain Register text at the top
Login - Email should be rendered
Login - Password should be rendered
Login - Confirm password should be rendered
Login - Email should be empty
Login - Password should be empty
Login - Loading button should be disabled
Login - Show password
Login - password as password type
Login - Password visibility for password
Login - Input should change according to value typed
Login - Button must be disabled when only email exists and appropriate required error message must be shown
Login - Button must be disabled when only password exists and appropriate required error message must be shown
Login - Button must be disabled when only all fields are required
Login - Button must be enabled when only all fields exist
Login - Fields are required
Login - Validation error when email is not valid
Login - Validation error when email does not match format
Login - Validation error when password is not valid
Login - Validation error when password is less than 8 characters
Login - Validation error when password is more than 8 characters
Login - Should contain Already have an account text for user who already has an account
Login - Should contain link to login page
Login - Should contain copyright text at the end
Login - should call handleLogin when user Email is not good on form submit
Login - should call handleLogin when user Password is not good on form submit
Login - should call handleLogin when user Eamil and Password is not good on form submit
Login - should call handleLogin when there is no server
Login - should call handleRegister with correct parameters on form submit and direct to homepage
